trans-unit.source: Represents a single ink stroke.
trans-unit.target: Representa um stroke de tinta digital único.

trans-unit.source: A Stroke is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Um Stroke é o objeto de dados que é recolhido a partir de um dispositivo apontador, tais como uma caneta tablet ou um rato.

trans-unit.source: The Stroke can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: A traço pode ser criada e manipular programaticamente e pode ser representado visualmente num elemento ativada de tinta digital, como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A Stroke contains information about both its position and appearance.
trans-unit.target: Um Stroke contém informações sobre a respetiva posição e um aspeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property is a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects that specifies the position of the Stroke.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>propriedade é uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos que especifica a posição do Stroke.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> property specifies a stroke's appearance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>propriedade especifica o aspeto de um stroke.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty..
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsestá vazia...

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object that specifies the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto que especifica o aspeto do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: -or- drawingAtrributes is .
trans-unit.target: -or- drawingAtrributes is .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty.
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsestá vazio.

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma propriedade personalizada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you need to store extra information in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se tiver de armazenar informações adicionais no <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`tem de ser do tipo <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>ou uma matriz destes tipos de dados, exceto <xref:System.String>, que não é permitido.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The propertyData argument is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: O propertyData argumento não é um dos tipos de dados permitido listados no secção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a deep copy of the existing <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cópia profunda existente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The properties of an object that is a deep copy of another object have the same values as the properties of the original object.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de um objeto que é uma cópia de outro objeto profunda têm os mesmos valores de propriedades do objeto original.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object contains the specified custom property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto contém a propriedade personalizada especificada.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the custom property exists; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade personalizada existe; caso contrário, devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto com base na especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objeto no qual o traço será composto.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto com base na especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objeto no qual o traço será composto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto definir os atributos de stroke que é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> especificado no <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Override the DrawCore method to perform custom drawing when you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de DrawCore para executar o desenho personalizado quando herdar da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objeto no qual o traço será composto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto definir os atributos de stroke que é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: These attributes, such as color and width, are applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object as it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Estes atributos, tais como a cor e largura, são aplicados para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objeto como é desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Changing DrawingAttributes causes the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged> event to fire.
trans-unit.target: Alterar DrawingAttributes faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>evento a acionar.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The set value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de conjunto é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object change.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> alteração de objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs> contains information about the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>contém informações sobre a propriedade que foram alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can compare the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A> property against the members of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> to see which value changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode comparar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>propriedade contra os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds>para ver qual o valor foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drawing attributes of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os atributos de desenho de um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto são substituídos.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> uses when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os pontos de caneta o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utiliza quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: The GetBezierStylusPoints method returns a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the stylus points that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> uses when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método de GetBezierStylusPoints devolve um novo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>que contém a caneta pontos que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>utiliza quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> is set to `false`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os pontos de caneta que são utilizadas quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>está definido como `false`, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points along the spine of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém os pontos de caneta juntamente spine de um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a caixa delimitadora para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure defining the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> estrutura que define o delimitadora caixa para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estão dentro dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: O método GetClipResult devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>que contém traços que representam os segmentos do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>que está dentro do `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult não altera o original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O método GetClipResult estabelece ligação os pontos de primeiro e últimos `lassoPoints` para criar o lasso.

trans-unit.source: The points that specify the line which defines where to clip.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos que especifique a linha que define onde recortar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> que contém cópias dos segmentos da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estão dentro dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estejam dentro do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: O método GetClipResult devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>que contém traços que representam os segmentos do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>que está dentro do `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult não altera o original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to clip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> Especifica que a área de clip.

trans-unit.source: A that contains copies of the segments of the current that are within the bounds of bounds.
trans-unit.target: A que contém cópias dos segmentos da atual que estão dentro dos limites da bounds .

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estejam fora dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEraseResult devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>que contém traços que representam os segmentos do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>que estejam fora do `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult não altera o original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A> method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>método estabelece ligação os pontos de primeiro e últimos `lassoPoints` para criar o lasso.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> Especifica que a área de apagar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> que contém os segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estejam fora dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estão fora do rectângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEraseResult devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>que contém traços que representam os segmentos do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>que estejam fora do `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult não altera o original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> Especifica que a área de apagar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> que contém os segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> que estão fora dos limites da especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the designated path using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os segmentos de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> depois-é dissected a utilizar especificado no caminho designado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method uses `eraserShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath` and returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that represent dissected segments.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEraseResult utiliza `eraserShape` para acessos stroke ao longo de teste `eraserPath` e devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>que representam segmentos dissected.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult não altera o original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path that dissects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que especifica o caminho que dissects o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> que especifica a forma do eraser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the specified path.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> que contém cópias dos segmentos da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> depois-é dissected pelo caminho especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetGeometry method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> to customize the shape of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método GetGeometry para obter uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>para personalizar a forma de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Considere a colocação em cache o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>para evitar a chamar GetGeometry várias vezes, que podem afetar o desempenho.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetGeometry method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> properties of `drawingAttributes` to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetGeometry utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>Propriedades de `drawingAttributes` para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Considere a colocação em cache o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>para evitar a chamar GetGeometry várias vezes, que podem afetar o desempenho.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that determines the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> que determina o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property data for the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de propriedade para o GUID especificado.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> containing the property data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> que contém os dados de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdnão está associado uma propriedade personalizada do .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os GUIDs de quaisquer propriedades personalizadas associadas a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Guid> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Guid>objetos.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> intersetar o ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method behaves the same way as the overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29> method does when `diameter` is 1.
trans-unit.target: Este método funciona da mesma forma que o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>método quando `diameter` é 1.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> para acessos de teste.

trans-unit.source: if point intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se point intersetar o traço atual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> está dentro dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O método HitTest estabelece ligação os pontos de primeiro e últimos `lassoPoints` para criar o lasso.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que representa os limites da área de teste de acessos.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `lassoPoints` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: A percentagem do comprimento do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, tem de estar no `lassoPoints` para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> equacionar acessos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current stroke is within the specified bounds; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o traço atual estiver dentro dos limites especificados; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified path intersects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve se o caminho especificado intersetar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method uses `stylusShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath`.
trans-unit.target: O método HitTest utiliza `stylusShape` aceder ao testar o traço juntamente `eraserPath`.

trans-unit.source: The path that `stylusShape` follows for hit testing
trans-unit.target: O caminho que `stylusShape` segue-se para acessos de teste

trans-unit.source: The shape of `path` with which to hit test.
trans-unit.target: A forma de `path` que atingiu o teste.

trans-unit.source: if stylusShape intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se stylusShape intersetar o traço atual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> intersetar a área especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that defines the center of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que define o centro da área de teste de acessos.

trans-unit.source: The diameter of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: O diâmetro da área para acessos de teste.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified area intersects the current stroke; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a área especificada intersetar stroke atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> está dentro dos limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que representa os limites da área de teste de acessos.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `percentageWithinBounds` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit..
trans-unit.target: A percentagem do comprimento do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, tem de estar no `percentageWithinBounds` para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> equacionar acessos...

trans-unit.source: if the current stroke is within the bounds of bounds; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o traço atual estiver dentro dos limites da bounds ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o aspecto do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the Invalidated event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>processa o evento de Invalidated e chamadas a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> method to raise the Invalidated event.
trans-unit.target: Se tem de herdar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe e do aspeto do seu stroke baseia-se no estado personalizado, tem de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A>método para aumentar o evento Invalidated.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Permite que as classes derivadas modificar o comportamento predefinido da <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir este método de uma classe derivada, chame o método de OnDrawingAttributesChanged da classe base para que os delegados registados recebem o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Permite que as classes derivadas modificar o comportamento predefinido da <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesReplaced method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir este método de uma classe derivada, chame o método de OnDrawingAttributesReplaced da classe base para que os delegados registados recebem o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the OnInvalidated method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se tem de herdar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe e do aspeto do seu stroke baseia-se no estado personalizado, tem de chamar o método OnInvalidated para aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>identificadores o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>eventos e as chamadas a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> alterações de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento que descreve a propriedade alterada, bem como valores antigos e novos.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Permite que as classes derivadas modificar o comportamento predefinido da <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnPropertyDataChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir este método de uma classe derivada, chame o método de OnPropertyDataChanged da classe base para que os delegados registados recebem o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsReplaced"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsReplaced"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the custom properties on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as propriedades personalizadas num <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> alterações de objetos.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a custom property from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Elimina uma propriedade personalizada do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os pontos de caneta o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os pontos de caneta que são utilizadas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> assigned to the StylusPoints property must have at least one <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>Atribuído para o StylusPoints propriedade tem de ter, pelo menos, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>no mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you try to assign an empty <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> to StylusPoints, or remove all the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects from StylusPoints, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar atribuir vazio <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>StylusPoints ou remover todas as <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos de StylusPoints, ocorre uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points that represent the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém os pontos de caneta que representam atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property is assigned a new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>propriedade está atribuída a novos <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Performs a transformation based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Efetua uma transformação com base no especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>objeto representa uma matriz de 3, 3 utilizada para transformações no espaço two-dimensional.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>

trans-unit.source: Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix.
trans-unit.target: Cada ponto do objeto Stroke é transformado pela matriz fornecida.

trans-unit.source: For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo se o valor de Point.X original for 100, o valor de Point.Y original é 55 e a transformação Matrix.Scale (0,5, 0,5), o novo valor de Point.X é 50 e o novo valor de Point.Y é 27.5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object defining the transformation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> objeto definir a transformação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para aplicar a transformação a sugestão de caneta; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
